title: Unboxing October 2018 Cursed Loot Crate
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Like most here, I agree the Hotel Cortez keychain is the coolest thing!! Should you use it?..I'm going to say no & use it decoratively. (like maybe in some clever place like hanging outside a bedroom/main doorway or something..) Even if the metal parts are very sturdy & don't break, the tassel part I'd say will Def. get ruined/rip off/ect.
OMG the AHS key chain is EVERYTHING!!!  I Love the Pin too!!  Im gonna have to check out Loot Crate for sure!!
OMG I need to have the Hotel Cortez key chain!!!! It looks so good!

My favorite by far is that keychain !!!!!! I wouldn't use it!!!
😂😂😂😂
Gurl! Personally I’d frame that keychain! 💜☮️
description:
When #Lootcrate said they were making a box with special #TheEvilDead2 and #AmericanHorrorStory items, I had to have it.

Loot Crate:
